resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The pusher propeller was powered by a 72-horesepower piston engine.
resource.chars: The pusher propeller was powered by a 72-horesepower piston engine.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Air flow created by the forward motion of a gyrocopter causes the unpowered blades to autorotate and generate lift.
resource.chars: Air flow created by the forward motion of a gyrocopter causes the unpowered blades to autorotate and generate lift.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M7389.54296,440.89248h1948.68331v0h1948.68331v601.08997v601.08997h-1948.68331h-1948.68331v-601.08997z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"nonHoverStrokeColor":["Color",0,0.74902,1],"editable":true,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null}" id="rectangle_15270cb3-e912-49df-bd64-ce926437d8fa" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: No equipment had to be changed for the conversion from aircraft to automobile. On the road, the B-8M could reach speeds of up to 35 mph.
resource.chars: No equipment had to be changed for the conversion from aircraft to automobile. On the road, the B-8M could reach speeds of up to 35 mph.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1975.68781,6591.81466h539.12415v0h539.12415v614.13541v614.13541h-539.12415h-539.12415v-614.13541z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"nonHoverStrokeColor":["Color",0,0.74902,1],"editable":true,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null}" id="rectangle_b8029456-dc8b-4a03-9554-e655108ad9ad" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Standing just slightly over 6 feet, with a rotor diameter of 20 feet, the B-8M could easily be stored in a garage.
resource.chars: Standing just slightly over 6 feet, with a rotor diameter of 20 feet, the B-8M could easily be stored in a garage.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The controls consisted of steering bar, a stick with a twist-grip throttle, and foot pedals for the rudder.
resource.chars: The controls consisted of steering bar, a stick with a twist-grip throttle, and foot pedals for the rudder.
